ComicInfo.Summary:
As the Turtles struggle to come together in the face of recent setbacks, Old Hob's unusual new enforcers make their presence known. Will they be friend or foe?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Sophie Campbell | 1 | B | Cover B | Kevin Eastman (a) & Fahriza Kamaputra (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Sam Lotfi (a) & John Rauch (c) | 3 | RE | Big Time Collectibles Exclusive Variant Cover | Dexter Soy | Missing | RE | Slab City Comics Exclusive Variant Cover | Emil Cabaltierra | Missing |
